summary: A collection of unit test classes and helper utilities that validate various aspects of data structure handling—such as fixed‑length fields, nested layouts, optional and sparse elements, ASCII Z‑array processing, and unpacking logic—using the impacket Structure framework.
business_intent: Provide comprehensive automated testing to guarantee correct parsing, serialization, and edge‑case handling of custom binary structures, thereby improving code reliability and preventing regressions in the surrounding library.
